Template.Text:
<v-container style="max-width: 800px" data-cy="form-container">
  <v-card class="elevation-24">
    <v-toolbar dark color="primary">
      <v-toolbar-title>My Form</v-toolbar-title>
    </v-toolbar>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-alert type="success" v-if="form.successMessage" data-cy="form-successmessage">
        {% raw %}{{form.successMessage}}{% endraw %}
      </v-alert>
      <v-alert type="error" v-if="form.submitValidationError" data-cy="form-errormessage">
        {{"formErrorMessage" | localize}}
      </v-alert>
      <validation-provider name="name" v-slot="{ errors }">
        <v-text-field
			v-model="name"
            :counter="10"
            :error-messages="errors"
            label="{{'name' | localize}}"
			data-cy="form-field-name"
        ></v-text-field>
      </validation-provider>
      <validation-provider name="email" rules="required|email"  v-slot="{ errors, valid }">
        <v-text-field
            v-model="email"
            :error-messages="errors"
            :success="valid"
            label="E-mail"
            required
			data-cy="form-field-email"
		></v-text-field>
      </validation-provider>

      <validation-provider name="gender" rules="required" v-slot="{ errors, valid }">
        <v-select
            :items="items"
            v-model="gender"
            :error-messages="errors"
            :success="valid"
            label="Gender"
            required
			data-cy="form-field-gender"
        ></v-select>
      </validation-provider>
    </v-card-text>
    <v-card-actions>
      <v-btn @click="obs.reset" data-cy="form-button-clear">Clear</v-btn>
      <v-btn @click="formDataReset" data-cy="form-button-formClear" >Clear Form data</v-btn>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn color="primary" @click="formHandleSubmit" :disabled="form.submitting || form.submitSuccess" data-cy="form-button-submit">Sign Up</v-btn>
    </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
</v-container>

LocalizedItems.Value: La soumission de votre formulaire est un succès.
Une erreure est survenue lors de la soumission du formulaire.
An error occurred while submitting your form.

<v-container style="max-width: 800px" data-cy="form-container">
  <v-card class="elevation-24">
    <v-toolbar dark color="primary">
      <v-toolbar-title>My Form</v-toolbar-title>
    </v-toolbar>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-alert type="success" v-if="form.successMessage" data-cy="form-successmessage">

            v-model="email"
            :error-messages="errors"
            :success="valid"
            label="Email"

		></v-text-field>
      </validation-provider>

      <validation-provider name="Gender" rules="required" v-slot="{ errors, valid }">
        <v-select
            :items="items"
            v-model="gender"
            :error-messages="errors"
            :success="valid"
            label="Gender"
            required
			data-cy="form-field-gender"
        ></v-select>
      </validation-provider>
    </v-card-text>
    <v-card-actions>
      <v-btn @click="obs.reset()" data-cy="form-button-clear">Clear</v-btn>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn color="primary" @click="formHandleSubmit" :disabled="form.submitting || form.submitSuccess" data-cy="form-button-submit">Sign Up</v-btn>
    </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
</v-container>

LocalizedItems.Value: La soumission de votre formulaire est un succès.
Une erreure est survenue lors de la soumission du formulaire.
